alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued August 12 at 2:57PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY... The Texas Department of Environmental Quality (TCEQ) has issued an Ozone Action Day for the El Paso Area, from 8 AM to 8 PM MDT Saturday. Atmospheric conditions are expected to be favorable for producing high levels of ozone pollution in the El Paso area. You can help prevent ozone Pollution by sharing a ride, walking, riding a bicycle, taking your lunch to work, avoiding drive through lanes, conserving energy and keeping your vehicle properly tuned. For more information on ozone: Go to the web and check out TAKE CARE OF TEXAS dot org slash air slash air quality.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County
